renderpass.name: Image

renderpass.code:
#define R iResolution.xy
#define Main void mainImage(out vec4 Q, in vec2 U)
#define N (int(R.x)%8==0?8.:10.)
#define R3 vec3(R/N,N*N)
#define g .5
#define _3D(U) vec3(mod((U)-.5,R3.xy),floor(((U).x-.5)*N/R.x)+N*floor(((U).y-.5)*N/R.y))

#define _2D(V) (.5+floor(clamp(V,vec3(0),R3).xy+R/N*vec2(mod(clamp(V,vec3(0),R3-1.).z,N),floor(clamp(V,vec3(0),R3-1.).z/N))))

#define F(V) texture(iChannel0,_2D(V)/R)
#define H(V) texture(iChannel1,_2D(V)/R)

#define ei(a) mat2(cos(a),sin(a),-sin(a),cos(a))
float box( vec3 p, vec3 b )
{
    vec3 d = abs(p) - b*0.5;
    return min(max(d.x,max(d.y,d.z)),0.0) + length(max(d,0.0));
}
